creator: morrijr@apache.org
text:
See summary (attachment examples to follow)

Using

./fop.sh -xml sample.xml -xsl sample.xsl -pdf sample.pdf

to process.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
I can't reproduce this with either 0.20.5rc or the latest CVS maintenance source.
I didn't try rc2 or the 0.20.5 release (identical to rc3a).
Reopen the bug if you can reproduce it, and append any information about your
environment which may be useful to track down the circumstances (JRE version,
compiler, platform, whatever).

Windows 2k Professional
Using cygwin (but repeated under dos)
From a clean directory,
$ cvs -d :pserver:anoncvs@cvs.apache.org:/home/cvspublic co xml-fop
$ cd xml-fop
$ ./build.sh package

Fop Build System
----------------


Building with classpath
d:\Wrkfile2\Java\j2sdk\1\4\1_02\lib\tools.jar;d:\Wrkfile2\Java\j2sdk\1\4\1_02\lib\classes.zip;lib\ant.jar;lib\xml-apis.jar;lib\xercesImpl-2.2.1.jar;lib\xalan-2.4.1.jar
Starting Ant...

Buildfile: build.xml

init-avail:
     [echo] Apache Ant version 1.5.1 compiled on October 2 2002
     [echo] Jimi Support NOT Present
     [echo] JAI Support NOT Present
     [echo] JCE Support PRESENT
     [echo] JUnit Support NOT Present

<build snipped/>

$ cp ~/sample.* .
$ ./fop.sh -xml sample.xml -xsl sample.xsl -pdf sample.pdf

I get exactly the same output as originally attached.  (Question: is my xml/xsl
OK? or am I doing something fundamental wrong?)

JVM's tried:
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.1_02-b06)
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.2-beta-b19)

Viewing the pdf in Adobe Acrobat Reader 6.0

Is there anything else I can do?
creator: morrijr@apache.org
jeremias@apache.org
text:
You've caught the FOP currently being redesigned. If you want the code where 
the 0.20.5 release came from you have to check out using tag "fop-0_20_2-
maintain". Read http://xml.apache.org/fop/dev/#lines for more information.

creator: morrijr@apache.org
text: Thanks, that fixed it.  I suppose I ought to re-open this bug for the alt-design ;)
